title: BRIEF-SKY Network Television Signs Broadcast Deal With Certain Rugby Unions
text:
BRIEF-SKY Network Television Signs Broadcast Deal With Certain Rugby Unions

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 13, 2019 22:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SKY Network Television Signs Broadcast Deal With Certain Rugby Unions Oct 14 (Reuters) - SKY Network Television Ltd : * REACHED AGREEMENT ON A BROADCAST DEAL WITH NEW ZEALAND, AUSTRALIAN, SOUTH AFRICAN AND ARGENTINIAN RUGBY UNIONS * DEAL EXTENDS SKY'S EXISTING SANZAAR BROADCAST RIGHTS TO 2025 * ANTICIPATES BEING ABLE TO PROVIDE EARNINGS GUIDANCE AROUND TIME OF FEB 2020 INTERIM RESULTS * FIVE-YEAR AGREEMENT INCLUDES NZR BECOMING A 5% SHAREHOLDER IN SKY * NOW THAT CO HAS GREATER CERTAINTY ON OTHER KEY RIGHTS, IT IS WORKING DETAILS INTO ITS REVISED FORECASTS * IF APPROVED, 5% STAKE UNDER AGREEMENT TO INVOLVE SKY ISSUING 21.8 MILLION SHARES TO NZR ON 1 NOV AS PART CONSIDERATION

BRIEF-SKY Network Television Signs Broadcast Deal With Certain Rugby Unions
description: BRIEF-SKY Network Television Signs Broadcast Deal With Certain Rugby Unions
